document_data.name: Dragonship
document_data.mainbody: '''Dragonships''' were large rowed warships used by the [[Evermeet]] navy.
document_data.Description:
These vessels were {{SI|100|ft|long=yes}} long and {{SI|20|ft|long=yes}} wide, propelled by sails and [[oar]]s. Dragonships had heavily decorated hardwood hulls carved with runes and [[totemic image]]s, and large, colorful, magical sails.

Dragonships were roughly analogous to [[Northlander]] [[longship]]s, having 40 crew and up to 135 extra soldiers aboard, and were capable of reaching great speeds when rowed intensely. Armed with only a single heavy [[catapult]], they were most often used to ambush enemy ships or suddenly land warriors into battle ashore. They also carried up to three [[Catamaran (elven)|catamarans]] that could be dropped into the water, and worked alongside the [[swanship]]s and [[wardragon]]s of the fleet.
